sub_title: English Language Teacher - self-employed Academic & Business English teacher
summary:
Experienced Native English Language Teacher

Trainer Effective Business Communications at RSM

Cambridge Exams Teacher: Cambridge exam preparation courses for teachers and students at all levels.

Experienced VVTO-English adviser and teacher trainer.  Workshops and 'teachers skills' courses (eigenvaardigheid).    

Academic Writing Teacher

 Translator Dutch-English (medical, educational, shipping and offshore, social work terminology)
